suite.name: 3.Server Tests

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=jail_mock_api, url=http://localhost:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Session Created Successfully On Mock Server.
kw.arg: Session Created Successfully On Mock Server.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.name: 3.1 Handle RMS Unavailability Properly

kw.name: Name
kw.msg: ${random_name} = Sophia Wilson

kw.name: Date
kw.msg: ${random_date} = 1975-10-27
kw.doc: Get a date string between January 1, 1970 and now.

kw.name: Random Element
kw.msg: ${random_facility} = Crestview Labs
kw.doc: Generate a randomly sampled object from ``elements``.

kw.name: Random Element
kw.msg: ${random_crime} = Theft
kw.doc: Generate a randomly sampled object from ``elements``.

kw.name: Random Element
kw.msg: ${random_priority} = Medium
kw.doc: Generate a randomly sampled object from ``elements``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: &{random_booking} = { name=Sophia Wilson | bookingDate=1975-10-27 | facility=Crestview Labs | crimeType=Theft | priority=Medium }
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Log Dictionary
kw.msg: Dictionary size is 5 and it contains following items: bookingDate: 1975-10-27 crimeType: Theft facility: Crestview Labs name: Sophia Wilson priority: Medium
kw.doc: Logs the size and contents of the ``dictionary`` using given ``level``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.msg: ${random_booking} = {'name': 'Sophia Wilson', 'bookingDate': '1975-10-27', 'facility': 'Crestview Labs', 'crimeType': 'Theft', 'priority': 'Medium'}
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
